languages.text: "К сожалению, у Империума есть не только внешние враги. Мутанты могут быть весьма опасны, особенно если смогут организоваться".
"Alas, the Imperium's enemies are not limited only to those within its midst. Mutants can become a considerable threat, especially when given the chance to organise."
languages.original_text: "К сожалению, у Империума есть не только внешние враги. Мутанты могут быть весьма опасны, особенно если смогут организоваться".

traits.locale_text: "Alas, the Imperium's enemies are not limited to those within its midst. Mutants can become a considerable threat, especially if allowed to organise."
"Alas, the Imperium's enemies are not limited to those within its midst. Mutants can become a considerable threat, especially if allowed to organise."
"Alas, the Imperium's enemies are not limited only to those within its midst. Mutants can become a considerable threat, especially when given the chance to organise."
"Alas, the Imperium's enemies are not limited only to those within its midst. Mutants can become a considerable threat, especially when given the chance to organise."
"Alas, the Imperium's enemies are not limited only to those within its midst. Mutants can become a considerable threat, especially when given the chance to organise."
"Alas, the Imperium's enemies are not limited only to those within its midst. Mutants can become a considerable threat, especially when given the chance to organise."

languages.text: «Por desgracia, los enemigos del Imperium no se limitan únicamente a los traidores. Los mutantes pueden convertirse en una amenaza considerable, especialmente si se les permite organizarse».
languages.original_text: "Alas, the Imperium's enemies are not limited only to those within its midst. Mutants can become a considerable threat, especially when given the chance to organise."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia, los enemigos del Imperium no se limitan únicamente a los traidores. Los mutantes pueden convertirse en una amenaza considerable, especialmente si se les permite organizarse».

languages.text: 「ああ、帝国の敵は、内部だけにとどまらない。特に、団結する機会が与えられれば、変異体は大きな脅威となりうる」
languages.original_text: "Alas, the Imperium's enemies are not limited only to those within its midst. Mutants can become a considerable threat, especially when given the chance to organise."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、帝国の敵は、内部だけにとどまらない。特に、団結する機会が与えられれば、変異体は大きな脅威となりうる」

languages.text: “遗憾的是，帝国的敌人并不仅仅局限于外部侵扰。变种人可能会构成相当大的威胁，尤其是当他们有机会组织起来的时候。”
languages.original_text: "Alas, the Imperium's enemies are not limited only to those within its midst. Mutants can become a considerable threat, especially when given the chance to organise."

traits.locale_text: “遗憾的是，帝国的敌人并不仅仅局限于外部侵扰。变种人可能会构成相当大的威胁，尤其是当他们有机会组织起来的时候。”

languages.text: "Leider sind die Feinde des Imperiums nicht nur auf jene in seiner Mitte begrenzt. Mutanten können zu einer erheblichen Bedrohung werden, vor allem wenn sie Gelegenheit erhalten, sich zu organisieren."
languages.original_text: "Alas, the Imperium's enemies are not limited only to those within its midst. Mutants can become a considerable threat, especially when given the chance to organise."

traits.locale_text: "Leider sind die Feinde des Imperiums nicht nur auf jene in seiner Mitte begrenzt. Mutanten können zu einer erheblichen Bedrohung werden, vor allem wenn sie Gelegenheit erhalten, sich zu organisieren."

languages.text: « L'Imperium compte hélas bien plus d'ennemis que ceux qui grouillent en son sein. Les mutants peuvent représenter une menace considérable, surtout si on leur laisse l'occasion de s'organiser. »
languages.original_text: "Alas, the Imperium's enemies are not limited only to those within its midst. Mutants can become a considerable threat, especially when given the chance to organise."

traits.locale_text: « L'Imperium compte hélas bien plus d'ennemis que ceux qui grouillent en son sein. Les mutants peuvent représenter une menace considérable, surtout si on leur laisse l'occasion de s'organiser. »

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki İmparatorluk'un düşmanları, yalnızca apaçık ortada olanlarla sınırlı değildir. Özellikle organize olma şansı verilirse mutantlar da ciddi bir tehdit hâline gelebilir."
languages.original_text: "Alas, the Imperium's enemies are not limited only to those within its midst. Mutants can become a considerable threat, especially when given the chance to organise."
